settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: OpenAI ChatGPT
settings.keyHelp:
In order to communicate with OpenAI you need to
  • Create an account on the OpenAI home page
  • Create an API key
  • Copy the API key to the field below
This can be done by following this link
settings.prefixHelp: The question prefix is prefixed to all the generated questions. Please be aware that if you change this prefix the answers may violate the OpenAI policy and your account may be suspended.
settings.splitHelp: If the text is very long it will be divided into responses with the selected length. This is because text-to-speach devices usually have a text limit around 200 characters
